narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. The animal facility inspection was conducted with the Sanford 
ARC Facility Manager. IACUC documents review was conducted with the R & D Manger. The exit briefing was conducted 
with the IACUC Chair and the R & D Manager. 
 
This inspection was a site approval inspection. 
 
This site is now approved for regulated activity.
